params.name: billing_email
params.description: Billing email address. This address is not publicized.

params.name: name
params.description: The shorthand name of the company.

params.name: has_organization_projects
params.description: Toggles whether organization projects are enabled for the organization.

params.name: has_repository_projects
params.description: Toggles whether repository projects are enabled for repositories that belong to the organization.

params.name: default_repository_permission
params.description:
Default permission level members have for organization repositories:  
\* `read` \- can pull, but not push to or administer this repository.  
\* `write` \- can pull and push, but not administer this repository.  
\* `admin` \- can pull, push, and administer this repository.  
\* `none` \- no permissions granted by default.

params.name: members_can_create_repositories
params.description:
Toggles ability of non-admin organization members to create repositories  
\* `true` \- all organization members can create repositories.  
\* `false` \- only admin members can create repositories.
